intro: Succisa columbaria, commonly known as the common sandwort, is a low-growing, mat-forming perennial plant native to arctic and alpine regions of the Northern Hemisphere. Succisa columbaria is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil in extreme conditions.
